Thoughts on using markers instead of (or in addition to) moving?

> Thoughts on using markers instead of (or in addition to) moving?

The idea is to parametrize in order to make sure we test that behavior matches across the classes.  I don't see how using a marker instead gets us closer to that.

Hello @jbrockmendel! Thanks for updating the PR.

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/reductions/__init__.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/e3a6fc690b1e7da26cbbf563d69cf1df7b29d93e/pandas/tests/reductions/__init__.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/reductions/test_reductions.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/e3a6fc690b1e7da26cbbf563d69cf1df7b29d93e/pandas/tests/reductions/test_reductions.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/reductions/test_stat_reductions.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/e3a6fc690b1e7da26cbbf563d69cf1df7b29d93e/pandas/tests/reductions/test_stat_reductions.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/series/test_analytics.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/e3a6fc690b1e7da26cbbf563d69cf1df7b29d93e/pandas/tests/series/test_analytics.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/series/test_datetime_values.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/e3a6fc690b1e7da26cbbf563d69cf1df7b29d93e/pandas/tests/series/test_datetime_values.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/series/test_operators.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/e3a6fc690b1e7da26cbbf563d69cf1df7b29d93e/pandas/tests/series/test_operators.py) !

 - There are no PEP8 issues in the file [`pandas/tests/series/test_timeseries.py`](https://github.com/jbrockmendel/pandas/blob/e3a6fc690b1e7da26cbbf563d69cf1df7b29d93e/pandas/tests/series/test_timeseries.py) !

ok, would like to remove the classes and rather have separate files for each. can leave that for a separate pass.
